content:
/>
V.iv.1.C.3.a
.
Required Evaluations and Effective Dates for SC Disabilities
The coded conclusion on the
Codesheet
must contain the following information for all service-connected (SC) disabilities, both individually and as combined totals:
current percentage evaluation
current effective date
future percentage evaluation, if applicable, and
future effective date, if applicable.
Note
:  An effective date of pension entitlement is required only next to rating code 2.
Reference
:  For more information on backfilling historical rating data, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, 1.C.3.e
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section C - Coded Conclusion
citation: Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section C
